headline: JMU expert can discuss proposed Norfolk Southern merger with Union Pacific
summary: Harrisonburg, Virginia, Oct. 13, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- As Norfolk Southern continues talks to merge with Union Pacific, one of the nation’s largest West Coast railroads, the potential deal is drawing attention for how it could reshape the U.S. freight system. If approved, the merger would create the first true transcontinental rail carrier and significantly reduce competition in the industry. headline: Union Pacific Proudly Supports Communities with Over $4 Million to 430 Local Nonprofit Organizations
summary: OMAHA, Neb., October 13, 2025--Union Pacific Railroad is proud to announce the distribution of more than $4 million in local grants to 430 nonprofit organizations through its Community Ties Giving Program. The awards reinforce Union Pacific’s commitment to building strong, safe and sustainable communities across its 23-state network.

headline: Jim Cramer Discusses FedEx (FDX) & A Slowing Economy
summary: We recently published Jim Cramer Discussed These 13 Stocks And Talked About Market “Froth” & Dotcom Bubble. FedEx Corporation (NYSE:FDX) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed.
